title: User Details
createError: An error occurred while creating user detail
updateError: An error occurred while updating user detail
uploadProfilePictureError: An error occurred while uploading profile picture
fileTypeError: Only image files can be uploaded
profilePictureUrlMaxLength: Profile picture URL must be at most 500 characters
heightMax: Height must be at most 300 cm
weightMax: Weight must be at most 500 kg
descriptionMaxLength: Description must be at most 2000 characters
